successes.title: Paradise Desk - Everything you've ever wanted in a desk!
successes.description: The Paradise desk is the first desk designed completely for computer enthusiasts who want a premium desk. DVI USB3 Audio Power LED

Pledges.description: Fund $1 and receive email updates that are exclusive for backers.
For us to bring the Paradise desk to Australia we need to see if there is a demand. So if you are from the land down under and want a desk, here is how you let us know!
Your name on the supporters page of our website.
Receive a custom 4GB USB flash drive with the Paradise logo on it. Along with the personalized thank you card and your name on the supporters page of the website.
FOR EUROPE ONLY - Limited Early Bird!

Reserve your desk your Paradise desk @$319*. We plan on having the euro versions ready to go mid 2014. You will receive a Paradise desk(Euro Spec), with all the fixings Power (specifically for your receptical type) | USB | DVI | Audio | LED lighting. Retail Price is $399 Along with the personalized thank you card and your name on the supporters page (as an elite supporter) of the website. *plus taxes and shipping
